meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vicky Smith Larissa Dizon Gavin Borchert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7575.

td.p: Vicky Smith, a children's book review editor from South Portland, Maine
Larissa Dizon, an academic advisor from San Diego, California
Gavin Borchert, a writer and editor from Seattle, Washington (whose 2-day cash winnings total $29,400)

tr.td: ABBREVIATED NO. 1 TV SHOWS
NATION STATE
KID LIT
YOU GET A "D"
ICYMI
(Alex: In case you missed it.)
HIDDEN GEMS
(Alex: The name of a gem is hidden with the text of each clue, and the letters are in order.)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'On CBS, 1983-1984:
big "D"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:

big "D"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Gavin: What is Rwanda?)
(Vicky: What is South Par--what is [*]?)
(Alex: Yes, you almost said South Park.)
[Laughter]

South Africa

GavinVicky
')
